sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> that you <radical>oversee</radical> are always <kanji>indigo</kanji>. You aren't sure why though...
meaningInfo: Imagine if every flower you were supposed to oversee was indigo. Indigo everywhere!
readingMnemonic: Wait, maybe these flowers are only <kanji>indigo</kanji> because there is something wrong with your <reading>eye</reading>s (<ja>あい</ja>)! Maybe your eyes are indigo and that's why it's all you see!
readingInfo: Can you imagine having indigo-only seeing eyes? I can. Because of this awesome mnemonic.
